attributes.action: Introduce legislation to make it obligatory for IPSA to go live online so that MPs expenses can be monitored by taxpayers, as they are paid.
attributes.additional_details: There are reports that the continued lack of transparency in MPs expenses and allowances is being misused by the authorities to manipulate the decisions made by members sitting in the House of Commons.  If this is true then online, live as it happens, monitoring by taxpayers is the only acceptable level of transparency in an age when our MPs continue to demonstrate themselves fundamentally incapable of even the most basic levels of honesty; integrity and probity over their dealings with taxpayer pounds.
